QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hearing or speech impairment - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on hearing impairment or speech impairment: Alexander Graham Bell Association for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing -- www.agbell.org , American Speech-Language-Hearing Association -- www.asha.org/public , National Institute on Deafness and Other Communication Disorders (NIDCD) -- www.nidcd.nih.gov , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/ncbddd/hearingloss/index.html , American Society for Deaf Children -- deafchildren.org , Hearing Loss Association of America -- www.hearingloss.org ,
